meanings.definition: Foolish or ridiculous behavior resembling that of a baboon.
meanings.sent1: The children's silly babooneries made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: His constant babooneries at work annoyed his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's babooneries on stage were a hit with the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her babooneries in trying to impress her crush were cringeworthy.
meanings.sent5: The babooneries of the clown were unforgettable and brought joy to all.

meanings.definition: Absurd or nonsensical actions or words.
meanings.sent1: The politician's babooneries during the debate confused the audience.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but laugh at the babooneries of the cartoon character.
meanings.sent3: The professor's babooneries in class left the students scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: The babooneries of the conspiracy theorist were beyond belief.
meanings.sent5: His babooneries in trying to fix the broken machine only made things worse.
